author: baranda
msg: MyFaces 1.2, first setup for the component autogeneration using the maven-faces-plugin from trinidad (using a snapshot now from a branched version of that plugin, that is able to generate to myfaces components classes, tags and configuration files).
Added myfaces-build module that contains the XML that define the components. First component autogenerated: UICommand, clap clap clap :-) Deleted old version
Still some issues with component and tag generation, but now it is possible to start writing the component xmls.

author: rgrabowski
msg: Added CONSOLE, TRACE, and NOOP aliases for logFactoryAdapter element's type attribute.

author: geirm
msg: Although it shows a new problem - I'll file a JIRA

author: jtolentino
msg: [MWAR-59] Resolution of ejb artifact final name. Now uses "-client" when artifact type is "ejb-client". Fix and test case modification submitted by Andreas Wuest.

author: lgawron
msg: use Cocoon-Block-Name jar manifest attribute for runtime deployment directory
